alert.note: Alert for Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 1:54PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range/East Chaffee County Above 9000 Feet and Saguache County East of Continental Divide Below 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft
